explains: n. 意识形态，思想体系；<古>观念学；<古>空想
wordGroup: political ideology 政治意识形态

sentences.en: He attributed the party's lack of success to an overemphasis on ideology and ideas.
sentences.cn: 他将该党的不成功归咎与过分强调意识形态和观点。
但这种意识形态是虚伪的。

sentences.en: Jerome McCann, for example, insists that Austen does not espouse the Romantic ideology.
sentences.cn: 例如，杰罗姆·麦肯坚持认为奥斯汀并不拥护浪漫主义意识形态。
